Articles.Content:
Hey, I don't know what I did or how to fix it but I am getting a black screen with my trunk from my mod and after a few seconds, then it crashes. Does anyone know what is causing this, I can't tell what it could be in the log. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Here's my log.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/99tbgd87oxr1eec/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/99tbgd87oxr1eec/output_log.txt?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-18T23:20:20Z" title="06/18/2015 11:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 18, 2015</time> by tygoo7**

Looks like the "not a number" bug, I'm guessing. I haven't really run into it myself, but your log has a ton of zero/NaN warnings before the end, starting with a vessel loading into a Sun-SOI trajectory with NaN values for the velocity vector.
Solved it, I was missing a few colliders which was causing the NaN bug. Thanks for pointing that out NecroBones.
